title: i_am_viral
author: i_am_viral
content: I’ve been building enormous value for my platform endfb.com an e-commerce and video production platform hosting auctioned advertising, and while at it I have not been able to earn much for myself.In my latest attempt I did an an advertisement for Binance and boosted it on Facebook in attempt to earn referral money, but the scumbag socialism and communist vibe giving Facebook mods did not approve the disney like video.So now I am thinking about selling solar panels ? What things actually carry real value ?

comments.author: onefry
comments.body: Glad to hear that you started something awesome like that.  Sorry to hear you got Zucked. I'm in a similar boat and hope to find that golden ticket.  I once had a client who started escape rooms all over USA, he made great money until covid hit.  Bump for someone greater than us to point us in the direction at some passive or even active income.  Need that side hustle.-FrY

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: onefry on July 12, 2022, 02:04:06 AM-snip-OP was banned, on top of that, he was a troll and someone untrustworthy.I am really questioning your motive here. You just woke up to bump a useless thread. I would be surprised if you are not one of the alternate profiles OP uses.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on July 12, 2022, 09:00:18 PMQuote from: onefry on July 12, 2022, 02:04:06 AM-snip-OP was banned, on top of that, he was a troll and someone untrustworthy.I am really questioning your motive here. You just woke up to bump a useless thread. I would be surprised if you are not one of the alternate profiles OP uses.On trying to look at the bright side as to why the user onefry must have bumped this thread, it's possible he or she didn't even know that the user was banned. Perhaps not aware of the case at the time and bans aren't indicated on a user too not except you check by some means (bpip).Again, the user in question isn't wearing any signature so, we can't say the bump was born out of meeting up with post quota and activities could be earned anywhere, even in off-topic so I wouldn't consider that.It's still questionable though as to why if we are to look past all this because, the OP is focused on his or her site exchange services and that could be private. Not being here makes the replies some worth useless. Perhaps OP is here as a guest or on another account andnnot having to tell makes posting on the thread off.
